name: Jump With Dragons
description:
The world is undergoing an invasion of dragons.
You must act against this horde led by the Evil Dragon.

Dragons will come to put pressure on you with different attacks.
When some of them will come at you to bite you, others will be more cunning.
And will attack you with their projectiles of wild fire and all that without counting the kamikazes.
And in order to prevent you from waiting for the exit of each level.
The Master is the Evil Dragons that you will have to defeat in order to bring peace to the world.


-3D Plateformer with a gun
-Collect parts by shooting it with your Primo Gun
-Various collectibles are present, some of which are hidden with cunning.
-Varied enemies with their own techniques
-Various types of environment
-Different obstacles to overcome at different levels
-Puzzle Jump
